newsitem.title: USA: Katy Industries Inc Q3 shr drops.
newsitem.headline: Katy Industries Inc Q3 shr drops.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE - The nine month period ended September 30, 1996, includes a gain from the sale of Union Pacific Corp common stock of $2,948,000, or $0.35 per share.

Q3 1996 and the first nine months ended September 30, 1996, include gains of $9.22 million, or $1.02 per share, from the sale of Union Pacific Corp common stock and from Katy's share of the gain on the sale of Syroco Inc by Syratech, a formerly held equity investment disposed of in the 1995 Q4.

The nine month period ended September 30, 1995, includes gains of $4.51 million, or $0.49 per share, from the restoration of Schoen's operating losses previously recorded and related tax benefits, less Schoen's operating loss for the period and income from Syratech, an equity investment which was sold in the 1995 Q4, net of imputed investment interests.
